Citizenship is membership in a settlement that provides civic powers. The more citizens a settlement has, the more [Settlement Property] it can claim.
Each settlement can grant citizenship to a list of individuals on the [CitizenRosterComponent] tab of the foundation object. Non-citizens can also apply for citizenship here, which must be approved by the Approver, which is set in the [Immigration Policy] settings, defaulting to the settlement leader. Additionally, all the citizens in any sub-settlements will also automatically be citizens in the parent settlement (IE, the citizens of every Town in a Country is also a citizen of the Country).
Players with an existing homestead, utilizing the [HomesteadSupportClaimPaperItem], can seamlessly join settlements by depositing an equivalent number of that settlement claim papers within their homestead.
